page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: There are 4 means of transport in our area _ {ROADS} There is one 'A' road _the A6,the Derby to Manchester Road.The main 'B' road _the B5035,is the Alfreton to Ashbourne Road. {RAIL} The Manchester,Buxton,Matlock and Midlands junction railway comes through the area with a station at Whatstandwell.There are 12 trains on weekdays,8 on Saturdays and 2 evening trains on Sundays. {CANAL} The Cromford Canal is now choked up though attempts are being made to clear it. {RIVER} The River Derwent is partially navigable in our area,although boats are not allowed.
